description: Great opportunity to live in a privileged environment and just 30 minutes from the center of Madrid. This home is located in Morata de Tajuña, a town full of history and green areas. Surrounded by countless routes and paths to walk along, enjoying the landscape next to the Vega del Tajuña and visiting the routes of the Battle of Jarama. It is a wonderful town house completely renovated and distributed as follows LOW LEVEL Where you will find the living room with air conditioning, an independent kitchen that is integrated into the living room with a large window and a bathroom with a shower and a hydromassage column. FIRST FLOOR On this floor is the rest area of the house. - The master bedroom, very spacious and bright, an open closet with the possibility of closing it if you wish and air conditioning. - A second bedroom with two windows that overlook the back of the house, where the patio is located - And a bathroom with a bathtub and towel radiator, which communicates independently with the two bedrooms YARD With about 130 square meters and where the covered parking area for two vehicles and a storage room is located. CAVE HOUSE The cave houses are one of the vestiges of the native popular architecture that Morata de Tajuña preserves and this property has one just below its patio, with access from the street behind the house. It has about 142 square meters, and although it is currently disused, it has possibilities to give it a new life. If you think that this house could be your future home, do not hesitate to contact me, I will be happy to provide you with all the information you request. In addition, we do not charge commission to the buyer and if you need advice with financing we can also help you.

ID-2513 MORATA DE TAJUÑA House divided into 3 floors. 1st floor: It has a large living room, 3 bedrooms, bathroom, separate kitchen. 2nd floor: It has 3 bedrooms, two of them with large terraces, bathroom. Basement: Living room, independent kitchen, patio and garage. Hot water and heating by Natural Gas. If you want to visit it, you just have to call me and I will organize a visit for you, or if you prefer you can send me an email or WhatsApp and I will contact you shortly. My name is Sonia.

description: We present this cozy and bright apartment belonging to an urbanization that is located in the urban area of Morata de Tajuña, close to transport and services. It is a comfortable home in which the luminosity that floods all the rooms predominates. It also has a large garage space and a storage room that are included in the price. The urbanization has, among its common areas, a swimming pool and garden. It will be an excellent choice whether you are looking for a place to live or if you are looking to make a profitable real estate investment. The population of Morata de Tajuña is a municipality and Spanish town in the southeast of the Community of Madrid whose municipal area is located in the valley of the Tajuña River, and its population is 8,115 inhabitants.

NEWLY RENOVATED HOUSING IN MORATA DE TAJUÑA! At Antilla Grupo Inmobiliario we present this wonderful opportunity to have your own home in a quiet and welcoming environment. This 74 m² home is distributed over two floors, giving you an intimate and functional space. On the ground floor, the cozy living room-kitchen becomes the heart of the home. This space has hot/cold air conditioning and hydro stove, providing a comfortable environment all year round. In addition, you will find a complete bathroom with natural ventilation, ensuring a fresh and well-ventilated environment. Going up to the upper floor, you will discover two charming bedrooms. One of them has a practical built-in wardrobe as well as extra space to maximize storage space. The other bedroom is also equipped with air conditioning, ensuring a peaceful night's sleep even on the hottest days. This town house has been completely renovated with current qualities, combining the charm of traditional style with modern comforts. It is the perfect place for those looking for the tranquility of Morata de Tajuña without giving up comfort. Don't miss the opportunity to turn this little house into your new home. Contact us today for more information and to schedule a visit to this wonderful home in Morata de Tajuña! The PVP does not include taxes, notary fees, registration fees, etc.
